oai_dc:dc.dc:title: John Nathaniel Henderson and wife, Hester Hubert
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: John Nathaniel Henderson (1843-1907) enlisted in Company E, 5th Texas Infantry, Hood's Texas Brigade in the beginning of the war and lost an arm at Antietam. After being wounded, he served under General J. B. Robertson in the rank of captain. After the war, he became a lawyer and judge.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Metro Archives, Nashville, Davidson County, Tennessee
